titles.title: Designating October 23, 1993, through October 31, 1993, as "National Red Ribbon Week for a Drug-Free America".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/28/1993--Introduced. Designates October 23 through 31, 1993, as National Red Ribbon Week for a Drug-Free America.
